title: Application spec
description: iTerm2 Focus application spec. An application written in swift to focus the iTerm2 application and switch to a specific tab and pane within that tab on Mac. Execution: ran via terminal-notifier using app protocol URL itermfocus://session?sessionId=<string> triggering main(sessionId: string), or as itermfocus.app [sessionId]. sessionId input: Use only the UUID part (e.g. C4A0EC6E-C61D-410D-ADD2-5E3E7D4F6394) from ITERM_SESSION_ID, even if w0t2p0: prefix is missing. Technical: iTerm window, tab and pane manipulations done using osascript only - find window/tab/pane IDs from sessionId, then activate iTerm and select the given window/tab/pane. Ref: mifkata/iterm2-focus#1
